name: Tread Carefully
description:
Winner of the ULTIMATE GAME JAM!!

Round 3 Mechanic: SPECIAL ABILIY
Round 2 Mechanic: MONEY
Round 1 Theme: DECAY

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys Aim: Mouse Shoot: Left Click Dash: Right Click or Space

You must make your way up 6 floors of the evil wizard's realm and battle him on the top. Before the ladder will appear you must break the energy orbs near the exit. Collect crystal shards and use them to but health potions, decoys, or strength potions. But it will reduce the amount of crystal shards you leave the game with. How many shards can you keep until the very end?
